Package com.mewna.catnip.entity.guild

Interface PermissionHolder

All Superinterfaces:
Entity, GuildEntity, Snowflake
All Known Subinterfaces:
Member, Role
All Known Implementing Classes:
MemberImpl, RoleImpl
public interface PermissionHolder
extends GuildEntity, Snowflake
An entity which is permission-scoped in catnip.
Since:
13/2/19.
Author:
schlaubi

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canInteract​(Member member)
    Checks whether the entity can interact with a member or not.
    boolean canInteract​(Role role)
    Checks whether the entity can interact with a role or not.
    default boolean hasPermissions​(GuildChannel channel, Permission... permissions)
    Checks whether the entity has the permissions or not in a specific GuildChannel.
    boolean hasPermissions​(GuildChannel channel, Collection<Permission> permissions)
    Checks whether the entity has the permissions or not in a specific GuildChannel.
    default boolean hasPermissions​(Permission... permissions)
    Checks whether the entity has the permissions or not.
    boolean hasPermissions​(Collection<Permission> permissions)
    Checks whether the entity has the permissions or not.
    Set<Permission> permissions()
    Returns a list of the entity's permissions.
    default long permissionsRaw()
    Returns the raw permissions of the entity as a long.
